modName: Godzilla and Co - Mounts and Armies
summary: This mod adds Godzilla, MechaGodzilla and Rodan in Skyrim (No DLC required)
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds Godzilla, MechaGodzilla and Rodan in Skyrim (No DLC required)

[img]https://i.imgur.com/RlswiWf.gif[/img]

- [color=#00ff00][size=5][b]WILD ANIMALS[/b][/size][/color] -

Adds 3 wild creatures in the tundra near Whiterun …

[i]Will you be crazy enough to fight them at the same time ?[/i]

[url=https://www.casimages.com/i/180723121642795432.jpg.html][img]https://nsa39.casimages.com/img/2018/07/23/180723121642795432.jpg[/img][/url]

- [color=#00ff00][size=5][b]RODAN[/b][/size][/color] -


[b][color=#ff0000]RIDEABLE RODAN[/color][/b]

To have the Summonable Rodan you must buy the “Spell tome: Conjure Rodan” at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whiterun) or with an other "Spell Vendor" (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude).

With the book you have the spell....Then summon the Rodan ...

(If you have not bought a book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game… buy the books, etc..)

The Rodan will appear above you...



[u][b]Controls[/b] [/u]

You can head in any direction (turn left or right, up and down) with the Mouse (Look up and look down to steer up and down) and

W (or Z): forward

A (or Q): turn left

D: turn right



You can summon your Rodan again when you have received the message "Dragon has returned".
(The Rodan will not disappear unless you mount it ride it and dismount it)

The Rodan do not help the player in combat and is supposed to be used as transport only

This mount contains a lot of bugs or problems (The legs tremble when you go up in altitude; You can be stuck on a tree) Save before taking a ride

“Whenever I fly, the camera constantly clips in and out of the dragon model”

Only to go up in altitude

You can also try the mouse scroll wheel, to zoom back

Sometimes you have to be patient to mount on the Rodan (If you are unable to ride the Rodan, you must go away from him and then return to him)

To dismount, you must land, and you have to wait to be well “IN” the ground, then "E"...

If your Rodan refuses to fly again (to return at "home" !) when landing you can try a FAST TRAVEL


[color=#ff0000][b]ARMY OF RODANS[/b][/color]

This mod adds the ability to quickly incubate eggs with the fire of the forge, and quickly create a horde of Rodans (5, 15, 50, MORE ? ...ATTENTION with the freezes in your computer !)

To obtain these eggs, simply bring the “Rodan Egg” found with some merchants in [b]WHITERUN [/b]([i]Merchants: Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare[/i]) to a forge and create the "Incubated Rodan Egg" in the "misc" section. Now open up your inventory, navigate to "Scrolls" and there they are. You throw them and when they hit the ground they hatch into Rodans

When your creatures die, remember to loot their corpses for more eggs

If you have my other mods with Incubated Eggs: Incubated Eggs, Curious Birds Mounts and Armies , Chimeras Mounts and Armies, New Gryphons Mounts and Armies, Snails and Slugs of Skyrim, Repopulate with Mushrooms, Griffins Mounts and Armies,Gerbils Mounts and Followers , Skaven Mounts and Followers or Incubated Winged Chocobos , in order to find these eggs at Merchants, you must choose the mod for which you want to buy and place it at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game.



- [color=#00ff00][size=5][b]GODZILLA and MECHAGODZILLA[/b][/size][/color] -


[color=#ff0000][b]ARMIES[/b] [/color](Little Godzilla and Baby MechaGodzilla)

… With the eggs ([i]Merchants: Arcadia of Arcadia’s Cauldron, Anoriath, Hulda of the Bannered Mare[/i]) !


[color=#ff0000][b]MOUNTS[/b][/color]

1) You must place this .esp at the bottom of the list in the Data Files when you launch the game to obtain the 3 books (Normally this is done automatically)

You can find the “Spell tome XXXX",at Farengar Secret-Fire in Dragonsreach (Whitherun) or with an other Spell Vendor (ex: Sybille Stentor in the Blue Palace in Solitude)

If you have not bought the book/spell, NO PROBLEM, you can always put again this mod at the bottom of the list… buy the book, etc

2) You can put in your Skyrim.ini ( user / my documents / my games / Skyrim ) the following settings (you can copy / paste the following):

[Camera]

fVanityModeMaxDist=2000.0000
fVanityModeMinDist=10.0000
fMouseWheelZoomMinDelta=0.0050
fMouseWheelZoomSpeed=0.8000
fMouseWheelZoomIncrement=0.01
fMinCurrentZoom=0.001

These settings allow you to see all mounts correctly, whether your character takes his weapon out or not


[url=https://www.casimages.com/img.php?i=18072209422116616015818560.jpg][img]https://nsm09.casimages.com/img/2018/07/22//18072209422116616015818560.jpg[/img][/url]


[color=#ff0000][b]BUGS or PROBLEMS[/b][/color]


If the Creature disappeared when you are riding on it (with impossibility to dismount!) ...

3 solutions to make the creature reappear:

1) Unzoom using the mouse wheel of the mouse
2) Fast travel
3) Enter / leave a house (but you have to be descended from the beast though !!!)


Rodan is not perfect and needs to be reworked by its author…


I can’t change the werewolves sounds of these creatures…


[b][i]Presentation of this mod (XBOX version)[/i]:[/b]

->->->->->->->->->->->->->->[youtube]DpcFDq862vI[/youtube]<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-<-

[color=#ff0000][b]CREDITS[/b][/color]

Thanks to [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCB9wW2tNmlTIZVsoMqri2_Q] Quechus13 [/url] and bonniethebeast for the Godzilla, the MechaGodzilla and the Rodan.

Free sounds



The Small House with Old Horses and Unicorn (on the screens) is in my mod:

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78954] The World Tree of Skyrim [/url]
